paper.title: Classifying an Organization to Identify Its Information Requirements: A Comprehensive Framework

keywords.keyword: Structured systems analysis and design method

paper.abstract: the author received the b.s. degree in Electrical Engineering from Banaras Hindu University in 1972, the m.tech. degree in Computer Science from i.t.t. Kanpur, India, in 1974, and the ph.d. degree in Business Information Systems from Georgia State University in 1981. He is currently an Assistant Professor at Texas Tech University, Lubbock, Texas. His research interests include systems analysis and design, database systems, knowledge-based systems, and software engineering. He has published in several journals, including Communications of the ACM and Journal of Systems and Software.
